definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to grow old with unfailing eyes and ears (idiom)
tablet and altar honoring a great benefactor (idiom)

sentences.english: Houyi some magic pills that could make him live forever.
sentences.chinese: 他给了后羿一些能使他长生不老的仙丹。

sentences.english: If you eat peaches grown on those trees, you will never die.
sentences.chinese: 如果你吃了那些桃树上结出的桃子，你就能长生不死。

sentences.english: It is said that drinking the water of Heaven Spring Waterfall will make one long-lived.
sentences.chinese: 据说常喝天泉瀑的水能长生不老。

sentences.english: Elixirs are concentrated alcohol extractions that are similar to both teas and tinctures .
sentences.chinese: 长生不老药是浓缩的酒精萃取物，类似于茶和酊剂。

sentences.english: And" tender is the way to make your life and keep the love ever-young of medicine."
sentences.chinese: 而且“温柔是使人生和爱情保持长生不老的仙药。”

sentences.english: The peach of immortality in Chinese mythology.
sentences.chinese: 神话里的蟠桃具有长生不死的功效。

sentences.english: People in ancient times spent a fortune on elixirs for fear of dying.
sentences.chinese: 古时候的人因为怕死，因此花很多钱在长生不老药。

sentences.english: She ascended from earth to live on the moon as a celestial being after drinking an elixir.
sentences.chinese: 她吃下长生不老药后化作仙女，从地球升到了月球上。

sentences.english: Of great age. Symbolizes longevity, permanence .
sentences.chinese: 年龄很高，象征长生，长久。

sentences.english: Accompanied Chang, and ramming system elixir.
sentences.chinese: 陪同嫦娥，并捣制长生不老药。

sentences.english: Your eyes, is my longevity won't again meet sea.
sentences.chinese: 你的眼睛，是我长生不会再遇的海。

sentences.english: Long, long ago, there lived a man in the town of Niigata. His name was Chosei Nagao.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，新舄有一位名叫长尾长生的人。

sentences.english: In 2005, 58 students went to regular colleges and universities.
sentences.chinese: 2005年有58名特长生被本科院校录取。

sentences.english: I have developed a new product that is the fountain of youth.
sentences.chinese: 我研发出了一种长生不老泉。

sentences.english: She’d want to know how doctors ended up curing cancer and senility.
sentences.chinese: 她会想知道医生们是如何治愈癌症并使人长生不老。

sentences.english: Kombucha can be traced back to ancient China where it was worshipped as a remedy for immortality.
sentences.chinese: 康普茶可追溯到古代中国，它作为长生不老药被崇拜。

definition: to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
to grow old with unfailing eyes and ears (idiom)
to enter the Way/to become a Daoist
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
